title: purpose of giving full effect to Regulation (EU) 2019/2152 of the European
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Statistics (Outward Foreign Affiliates)
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Statistics (Outward Foreign Affiliates) 

Order 2022.
text_norm: 1 order may cited statistic (outward foreign affiliates) order 2022

title: purpose of giving full effect to Regulation (EU) 2019/2152 of the European
heading: 2. (1) In this Order –
text_raw:
2. (1) In this Order – 

“Commission Implementing Regulation” means Commission Implementing 
Regulation (EU) 2020/1197 of 30 July 20202; 

“foreign affiliate” has the same meaning as it has in the Commission 
Implementing Regulation2; 

“institutional unit” means an economic entity that is capable of owning assets, 
incurring liabilities and engaging in economic activities and in transactions 
with other entities. 

“Regulation” means Regulation (EU) 2019/2152 of the European Parliament 
and of the Council of 27 November 20191, as amended by Commission 
Delegated Regulation (EU) 2021/1704 of 14 July 20213; 

“survey” means the Outward Foreign Affiliates Survey that is conducted by the 
Central Statistics Office for the purposes of obtaining, including for the 
purposes of compliance with the Regulation, information set out in the 
Schedule. 

(2) A word or expression that is used in this Order and also used in the 
Regulation or the Commission Implementing Regulation has the same meaning 
in this Order as it has in the Regulation and the Commission Implementing 
Regulation, as the case may be, other than where the context otherwise 
requires.

title: purpose of giving full effect to Regulation (EU) 2019/2152 of the European
heading: 3. This Order applies to an institutional unit that is classified for statistical
text_raw:
3. This Order applies to an institutional unit that is classified for statistical 
purposes under section B, C, D, E, F, G, H, I, J, K, L, M, N, P, Q, R or S of 
NACE Rev. 2, as set out in Annex I to Regulation (EC) No. 1893/2006 of the 
European Parliament and of the Council of 20 December 20064, as amended by

title: purpose of giving full effect to Regulation (EU) 2019/2152 of the European
heading: 4. A requirement on institutional units to which this Order applies to
text_raw:
4. A requirement on institutional units to which this Order applies to 
provide, once only and for the purposes of the survey, information, the general 
nature of which is specified in the Schedule, in relation to each year in the 
period from 2021 to 2025, is hereby prescribed. 

5 OJ No. L 97, 9.4.2008, p. 13 
6 OJ No. L 32, 3.2.2012, p. 1 
7 OJ No. L 198, 25.7.2019, p. 241 

 
 
 
 
 4 [566]

title: purpose of giving full effect to Regulation (EU) 2019/2152 of the European
heading: Article 4

title: purpose of giving full effect to Regulation (EU) 2019/2152 of the European
heading: Information regarding the following, as it relates to the institutional unit
text_raw:
1. 

Information regarding the following, as it relates to the institutional unit 

concerned during the year to which the information relates: 

(a) whether the institutional unit has foreign affiliates; 

(b) where the institutional unit has a foreign affiliate, whether the 
location of the ultimate controlling institutional unit of the 
foreign affiliate is in the State; 

(c) where the location of the ultimate controlling institutional unit 
of a foreign affiliate is not in the State, the location of the 
ultimate controlling institutional unit; 

(d) where the institutional unit is the ultimate controlling unit of a 
foreign affiliate, the following particulars in relation to that 
institutional unit: 

(i) 

the principal business activity in which it is engaged; 

(ii) 

the accounting year to which the information relates; 

(iii) 

the currency in which the amounts are expressed; 

(e) where the institutional unit is the ultimate controlling unit of a 
foreign affiliate, the following particulars in relation to the 
foreign affiliate: 

(i) 

name; 

(ii) 

the principal business activity in which it is engaged; 

(iii) 

the percentage shareholding which the institutional unit 
holds in the foreign affiliate; 

(iv) 

turnover; 

(v) 

the number of persons engaged by it; 

(vi) personnel costs; 

(vii) gross investment by it in tangible goods; 

(viii) labour costs. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 2. Particulars of the time taken to complete the form, questionnaire or 
other record prepared by the Director General for the collection of the 
information referred to in paragraph 1. 

[566] 5 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

9 November, 2022. 

MICHEÁL MARTIN, 

Taoiseach. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 6 [566]
